attributes.action: Ban importation of Hersheys chocolate into the UK, in response to USA ban of Cadburys
attributes.additional_details:
Hersheys chocolate USA, has successfully lobbied the USA government in the banning of the importation of Cadburys chocolate into the USA.

Hersheys in the USA will be taking money from the British economy by banning our products.

I would like the UK government to ban the importation of any Hersheys chocolate product into the United Kingdom.
